author: Special Correspondent
text:
Twelve persons were injured in a clash between people of two villages – Santhaiyur and Keezhapatti near Peraiyur – on Wednesday night.

Police said that a college student, Thangamudi, son of P. Thenusamy (55) of Santhaiyur, was recently assaulted when he was travelling on a bus by one Thangamuthu of Keezhapatti.

Following the incident, Thenusamy, along with four others, went to Keezhapatti to register his protest. However, a clash erupted between Thenusamy group and the local people.

Peraiyur police have registered cases against both the groups.

Police personnel have been deployed at the villages to prevent any untoward incident.
title: 12 injured in group clash
